A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is one of if not the best Star Wars movies since the original trilogy.  Can you find faults in the movie?  Sure you can\, but what movie doesn't have faults?   I am someone who was very young when A New Hope came out and was obsessed with the originals.   I thoroughly enjoyed this movie.  This and The Force Awakens make up for suffering through the prequels.
